name: US Heavy Truck Cargo Driving
description:
Show your skills as the extreme pro truck driver to drive heavy duty transporter truck carrying cargo, luggage, logs and cars in this US Heavy Truck Cargo Driving. Be careful on dangerous twists and turns and deliver cargo safely & be the best cargo truck driver.

Features:
Amazing 3D graphics.
Heavy truck with a real drive.
Free game play
Challenging roads.
Challenging environment.
Excellent sound effect.
